channel.title: How to make npcs talk!

item.title: How to make npcs talk!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“legit 99, post:34, topic:338574”]Not trying to gravedig, but for all the people who are getting 1 error when doing this, this is how you fix it.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Your text here";

That was his code he post. The reason you’re getting an error is becase it should say

instead. The < not being a = is what messed it up.[/quote]
wat

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs talk!
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

Not trying to gravedig, but for all the people who are getting 1 error when doing this, this is how you fix it.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Your text here";

That was his code he post. The reason you’re getting an error is becase it should say

if (misc.random2(30) == 1)

instead. The < not being a = is what messed it up.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs talk!
item.dc:creator: @deathrs deathrs
item.description:
@deathrs wrote:

[quote=“deathrs, post:25, topic:338574”][code] public void process() {

	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] == null)
			continue;
		npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			annoyNpcs(i);
			if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC > 0) {
				npcs[i].offTimerNPC--;
			}
			if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC == 1) {
				npcs[i].hitIDNPC = 0;
			}
			if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
				npcs[i].actionTimer--;
			}

//talking npc
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1152) {
if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “text here.”;}
}

//talking npc
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1152) {
if (misc.random2(10) == 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “text 2 here.”;}
}
[/code]

put that in npchandler…

search for the top code… public void process() {

and scroll down to if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
npcs[i].actionTimer–;
}

after that press enter and paste the talk code…[/quote]

added a second text line in code

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs talk!
item.dc:creator: @deathrs deathrs
item.description:
@deathrs wrote:

same thing here…

spanwed the npc…
used your code…

but he aint talking -.-
any idea’s?

EDIT:

[code] public void process() {

	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] == null)
			continue;
		npcs[i].clearUpdateFlags();
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			annoyNpcs(i);
			if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC > 0) {
				npcs[i].offTimerNPC--;
			}
			if (npcs[i].offTimerNPC == 1) {
				npcs[i].hitIDNPC = 0;
			}
			if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
				npcs[i].actionTimer--;
			}

//talking npc
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1152) {
if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “text here.”;}
}
[/code]

put that in npchandler…

search for the top code… public void process() {

and scroll down to if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) {
npcs[i].actionTimer–;
}

after that press enter and paste the talk code…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs talk!
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“dragon39990, post:14, topic:338574”]To make it say if someone is online it’s like this I belive—

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("dragon39990")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Dragon39990 is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Dragon39990 is OFFLINE"; } } } } [/quote]
Ahh thanks.

Read full topic
